channel.title: Some Questions on Max Item Amounts
channel.description:
Although the purpose of this is for a server, it deals with RuneScape. I have a couple of questions, since surely I cannot answer them myself.
1. When you have an item with the max stack value and try to withdraw another of the same item, will it say there is not enough space or begin a new stack?
2. When you have an item with the max stack value equipped, like arrows, and you try to equip more, does it swap the two items (so the new stack is in the slot and the max stack is in your inventory) or just say you can't?
Thanks,
~Lin

item.title: Some Questions on Max Item Amounts
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Lin:

I have my answer now. Thanks LilXCJ and Google. Mods can lock.

Read full topic
item.source: Some Questions on Max Item Amounts

item.title: Some Questions on Max Item Amounts
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:3, topic:374757”]1. Well, you can’t have two 2147M money stacks, can you? I’m pretty sure that it’ll say you cannot withdraw anymore of that item or something.

  1. Same as above.

Correct me if i’m wrong :D[/quote]

No, it actually just adds the two and remains at 2147m. Um look at the richest rs player on YT

Read full topic

item.title: Some Questions on Max Item Amounts
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:7, topic:374757”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=470721.msg3442376#msg3442376 date=1293157202]
i think ive seen a video of chessy018 with like 6 different max cash stacks, so yes
[/quote]NO ITS IN DA G.E.[/quote]

This is because they are being stored in separate areas.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Questions on Max Item Amounts
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Also interesting to note that 2147M is the maximum value for a 32-bit signed integer 2,147,483,647.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Questions on Max Item Amounts
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:1, topic:374757”]Although the purpose of this is for a server, it deals with RuneScape. I have a couple of questions, since surely I cannot answer them myself.

  1. When you have an item with the max stack value and try to withdraw another of the same item, will it say there is not enough space or begin a new stack?

  2. When you have an item with the max stack value equipped, like arrows, and you try to equip more, does it swap the two items (so the new stack is in the slot and the max stack is in your inventory) or just say you can’t?

Thanks,

~Lin[/quote]

As far as max stacks go, you cannot have more than one.

As far as equipping, they swap.

Edit: Gaaay, Whip of Soulz gave me 200 rep. >_>

Read full topic

Correct me if i’m wrong :D[/quote]
